languages.text: "Мы едины. Я неразрывна с тем, что за пределом меня. Я дверь. Я порог. Я ключ, и скважина, и пустота меж ними. Они говорят мной? Мы говорим ею? Простите, очень сложно, мы путаемся... Но мы научимся. Я больше не боюсь". {n}В каждую фразу псайкера вплетаются чуждые интонации и призвуки, словно тысяча голосов пытается одновременно прорваться наружу и сказать свое слово.{/n}

"We are one. I am inseparable from what is beyond me. I am the door. I am the threshold. I am the key, and the keyhole, and the void in between. Am I their voice? Is the void my voice? Forgive me, it is so difficult, we are confused... But we will learn. I am no longer afraid." {n}Different inflections and undertones weave into the psyker's every phrase, like a thousand voices at once are forcing their way out to have their say.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мы едины. Я неразрывна с тем, что за пределом меня. Я дверь. Я порог. Я ключ, и скважина, и пустота меж ними. Они говорят мной? Мы говорим ею? Простите, очень сложно, мы путаемся... Но мы научимся. Я больше не боюсь". {n}В каждую фразу псайкера вплетаются чуждые интонации и призвуки, словно тысяча голосов пытается одновременно прорваться наружу и сказать свое слово.{/n}

Is the void my voice? Forgive me, it is so difficult, we are confused... But we will learn. I am no longer afraid." {n}Different inflexions and undertones weave into the psyker's every phrase, like a thousand voices at once are forcing their way out to speak their word.{/n}

languages.text: “我们融为一体了，我和在我之外的一切已经无法分开了。我是门，也是门槛。我是钥匙，是钥匙孔，也是两者之间的虚无。我是他们的声音吗？还是说，虚无是我的声音？我很抱歉，但这太困难了，我们都糊涂了……不过我们会好好想清楚的，我已经不再害怕了。”{n}无数声音与语调交织在伊迪拉说出的每个字中，仿佛几千个声音同时挤在一起，争相表达自己的观点。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are one. I am inseparable from what is beyond me. I am the door. I am the threshold. I am the key, and the keyhole, and the void in between. Am I their voice? Is the void my voice? Forgive me, it is so difficult, we are confused... But we will learn. I am no longer afraid." {n}Different inflections and undertones weave into the psyker's every phrase, like a thousand voices at once are forcing their way out to have their say.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们融为一体了，我和在我之外的一切已经无法分开了。我是门，也是门槛。我是钥匙，是钥匙孔，也是两者之间的虚无。我是他们的声音吗？还是说，虚无是我的声音？我很抱歉，但这太困难了，我们都糊涂了……不过我们会好好想清楚的，我已经不再害怕了。”{n}无数声音与语调交织在伊迪拉说出的每个字中，仿佛几千个声音同时挤在一起，争相表达自己的观点。{/n}

languages.text: «Somos uno. Soy inseparable de lo que está más allá de mí. Soy la puerta. Soy el umbral. Soy la llave y la cerradura y el vacío que las separa. ¿Soy su voz? ¿Es el vacío mi voz? Disculpe, es muy complejo, estamos confundidas... pero aprenderemos. Ya no tengo miedo». {n}Distintas inflexiones y tonos se mezclan en cada frase de la psíquica, como si un millar de voces trataran de añadir su aporte al mismo tiempo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are one. I am inseparable from what is beyond me. I am the door. I am the threshold. I am the key, and the keyhole, and the void in between. Am I their voice? Is the void my voice? Forgive me, it is so difficult, we are confused... But we will learn. I am no longer afraid." {n}Different inflections and undertones weave into the psyker's every phrase, like a thousand voices at once are forcing their way out to have their say.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Somos uno. Soy inseparable de lo que está más allá de mí. Soy la puerta. Soy el umbral. Soy la llave y la cerradura y el vacío que las separa. ¿Soy su voz? ¿Es el vacío mi voz? Disculpe, es muy complejo, estamos confundidas... pero aprenderemos. Ya no tengo miedo». {n}Distintas inflexiones y tonos se mezclan en cada frase de la psíquica, como si un millar de voces trataran de añadir su aporte al mismo tiempo.{/n}

languages.text: "Wir sind eins. Ich bin untrennbar verbunden mit dem, was außerhalb meiner selbst liegt. Ich bin die Tür. Ich bin die Schwelle. Ich bin der Schlüssel und das Schlüsselloch und die Leere zwischen ihnen. Bin ich ihre Stimme? Ist die Leere meine Stimme? Vergebt mir, es ist so schwierig, wir sind verwirrt ... Doch wir werden es lernen. Ich habe keine Angst mehr." {n}Unterschiedliche Töne und Färbungen mischen sich in jeden einzelnen Satz der Psionikerin, als würden eintausend Stimmen gleichzeitig hinausdrängen, um zu Wort zu kommen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are one. I am inseparable from what is beyond me. I am the door. I am the threshold. I am the key, and the keyhole, and the void in between. Am I their voice? Is the void my voice? Forgive me, it is so difficult, we are confused... But we will learn. I am no longer afraid." {n}Different inflections and undertones weave into the psyker's every phrase, like a thousand voices at once are forcing their way out to have their say.{/n}

Doch wir werden es lernen. languages.text: 「私たちはひとつなのよ。私は私を超越するものと切り離せない。私は扉であり入口。そして鍵であり、鍵穴であり、その間にある虚空だわ。私は彼らの声なのかしら？虚空が私の声なの？ごめんなさい、すごく難しくて混乱してる…。でも、私たちは学び、私にはもう恐怖はないの」{n}その言葉には、さまざまな抑揚やニュアンスが織り込まれている。まるで一度に千の声が、何かを言おうと無理矢理外へ出ようとしているかのようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are one. I am inseparable from what is beyond me. I am the door. I am the threshold. I am the key, and the keyhole, and the void in between. Am I their voice? Is the void my voice? Forgive me, it is so difficult, we are confused... But we will learn. I am no longer afraid." {n}Different inflections and undertones weave into the psyker's every phrase, like a thousand voices at once are forcing their way out to have their say.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私たちはひとつなのよ。私は私を超越するものと切り離せない。私は扉であり入口。そして鍵であり、鍵穴であり、その間にある虚空だわ。私は彼らの声なのかしら？虚空が私の声なの？ごめんなさい、すごく難しくて混乱してる…。でも、私たちは学び、私にはもう恐怖はないの」{n}その言葉には、さまざまな抑揚やニュアンスが織り込まれている。まるで一度に千の声が、何かを言おうと無理矢理外へ出ようとしているかのようだ。{/n}

languages.text: « Nous ne faisons qu'un. Je suis inséparable de ce qui est au-delà de moi. Je suis la porte. Je suis le seuil. Je suis la clé, la serrure et le vide entre elles. Suis-je leur voix ? Le Vide est-il ma voix ? Pardonnez-moi, tout cela est compliqué. Nous sommes si perturbés... Mais nous apprendrons. Je n'ai plus peur désormais. » {n}Différentes inflexions et intonations s'insinuent dans chaque phrase de la psyker, comme si un millier de voix tentaient au même moment de s'extraire de la masse pour s'exprimer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are one. I am inseparable from what is beyond me. I am the door. I am the threshold. I am the key, and the keyhole, and the void in between. Am I their voice? Is the void my voice? Forgive me, it is so difficult, we are confused... But we will learn. I am no longer afraid." {n}Different inflections and undertones weave into the psyker's every phrase, like a thousand voices at once are forcing their way out to have their say.{/n}

languages.text: "Biz biriz. Ben, ötemdekinden ayrılamam. Ben kapıyım. Ben geçidim. Ben anahtarım, anahtar deliğiyim ve ötedeki uçsuzum. Ben onların sesi miyim? Uçsuz benim sesim mi? Kusura bakma, çok zor bir durumdayız, kafamız karışık... Fakat öğreneceğiz. Artık korkmuyorum." {n}Farklı ses tonları ve fısıltılar, sanki binlerce ses aynı anda konuşmaya çalışırcasına ruhsezerin her bir kelimesine işleniyor.{/n}

I am no longer afraid." {n}Different inflections and undertones weave into the psyker's every phrase, like a thousand voices at once are forcing their way out to have their say.{/n}
